page.title: 18Playground Games
page.content: I like to play Teams,a game we made up.One team runs away and the other team tries to catch them.When you are caught you have to stay in the cage until someone frees you by 'hadding' you.'Hadding' you means tapping them so they can run away again.When everybody is caught the other team runs away. One person is 'it' and counts to 44.All the rest hide.When the person has finished counting he looks for you.If you can get to the post without him seeing you first then you can shout "44 save all" which means everybody who has been seen is saved. We play Hot Rice.Everybody stands against a wall and the person who is 'it' has a tennis ball.He tries to hit the people against the wall and if he does they are 'it'.
